trs: The Nenets say: "If there is no father, then the child is half an orphan, and there is no mother - an orphan."

html:
Naɬiša wʼeɬkɬata ŋatmʼanta Naɬiša ŋaj-maj nʼe nʼu-m-ta nʼimʼi ŋuʔkta me-ʔma-xat-ta naɬa-ŋ
Narysha.[NOM.SG]
rightsholder: Budzisch, Josefina; Wagner-Nagy, Beáta. 2024. INEL Nenets Corpus. Version 1.0. Publication date 2024-12-31. https://hdl.handle.net/11022/0000-0007-FE37-E.
srcwordsbare: Naɬiša wʼeɬkɬata ŋatmʼanta Naɬiša ŋaj-maj nʼe nʼu-m-ta nʼimʼi ŋuʔkta me-ʔma-xat-ta naɬa-ŋ
trs: The surname Narysh appeared on behalf of this girl, because in the spring he sent his daughter to the next world.
